suggest.spryker-shop/discount-widget: If you want to use components from module DiscountWidget or DiscountSummaryWidgetPlugin
suggest.spryker-shop/multi-cart-widget: If you want to use components from module MultiCartWidget or CartOperationsWidgetPlugin
suggest.spryker/permission: If you want to use permissions plugins
suggest.spryker-shop/product-option-widget: If you want to use components from module ProductOptionWidget or CartItemProductOptionWidgetPlugin
suggest.spryker-shop/product-packaging-unit-widg: If you want to use components from module ProductPackagingUnitWidget or CartProductPackagingUnitWidgetPlugin
suggest.spryker/silex: Use this module when using plugins that need Silex dependencies.
